summary: REQ-46 and REQ-47 appear implemented (logo references updated in header/hero; favicon link added). REQ-45 is missing because the required new PNG assets are not added under frontend/public/assets/generated/. The diff also includes several UI/theme/content changes beyond the stated constraint of limiting changes to logo assets and logo references.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add new generated logo image assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`: `hnd-logo-badge-chef.dim_512x512.png` and `hnd-favicon-badge-chef.dim_64x64.png`.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added files, so the required new image assets are not present in the change set.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed hero and other UI behavior not limited to swapping logo references (e.g., introduction of a custom TikTok SVG icon component and other non-logo UI code in App).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints require changes to be limited to logo assets and logo references; TikTok icon/UI behavior is unrelated to updating logo and favicon.
evidence: frontend/src/App.tsx (adds "// TikTok icon component" and defines `TikTokIcon` SVG)

hallucinated_features.description: Broader site redesign/theme/menu-related changes (premium dark theme, menu section styling, watermark utilities, Tailwind/PostCSS config changes, menu/photo layout changes, business/menu content expansion).
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals/constraints explicitly say to keep changes limited to logo assets and references and not change existing site sections or unrelated content; these changes go beyond favicon/logo updates.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (describes premium dark mode color system, menu section styling, Tailwind config conversion, PostCSS config, menu item card layout changes, business menu structure updates)
